long_description: The Osprey Meridian 22 wheeled convertible luggage, with a removable daypack, can be wheeled along or carried on your back. For added versatility, the shoulder strap and waistbelt assemblies on this updated version are removable to free up extra packing space on trips where they won't be needed. Meridian's suspension has been fine-tuned to increase fit range; it is fully and easily adjustable to fit torso lengths from 16 to 22 in. Updated, fully-padded spacer mesh lumbar and hipbelt transfer load effectively; updated shoulder straps use upgraded foam and spacer mesh for improved comfort. High-clearance chassis is ready to roll practically anywhere; when the terrain gets too rough, the updated, ventilated backpack suspension lets you carry luggage in comfort. Large panel zip with lockable sliders lets you access the spacious main compartment without removing the daypack. 4 zippered pockets in the main compartment keep gear organized; upgraded internal compression straps with fabric wings hold clothes securely. External zip top pocket is ideal for toiletries, liquids and frequently needed items. Padded top and side carry handles provide comfortable carrying. Comfortable, smooth-operating retractable handle with ergonomic grip; hideaway quick-release attachment strap simplifies carrying an extra bag. Rear panel magazine pocket and I.D. card window. Osprey Meridian 22 has a zip-and-clip removable daypack; pouch clips on front panel retain daypack attachment buckles. Updated spacer mesh harness and back panel improves comfort and ventilation. Wide zip access to daypack main compartment; with 2 padded sleeves you can carry both a 15.4 in laptop and a 10 in. tablet or e-reader. Internal organizer panel and zip pocket keep travel necessities handy. Zip pocket and twin mesh pocket on front panel offer convenient, accessible storage.
